name: Regice

abilities.name: Regi Move
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may use this power. Discard 2 cards from your hand and choose 1 of your opponent's Active Pokémon that isn't an Evolved Pokémon. Then, your opponent switches that Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon. This power can't be used if Regice is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Ice Reflect
attacks.text: If Regice was damaged by an attack during your opponent's last turn, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

flavorText: Its body is made of ice from the ice age. It controls frigid air of -328 degrees Fahrenheit.
